title: Case Study #1: Using Data to Drive Esports Program Decision-Making
body:
## Case Study #1: Using Data to Drive Esports Program Decision-Making

This video presents a case study about using student data to inform the process of developing a college esports program. We cover the school's crucial demographic information, their strategic goals in launching an esports program, and how data collection leads naturally into next-steps.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1BYbC5fzPLo" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
author: Alex McNeil
